name: TED
bio: TED is a global platform for ideas worth spreading, featuring talks by experts from various fields.
The TED YouTube channel showcases a vast library of TED Talks, covering topics ranging from science and technology to business and social issues.
TED's content is characterized by its thought-provoking insights, diverse perspectives, and commitment to sharing knowledge and inspiration.
TED Talks are often presented by leading thinkers, researchers, and innovators from around the world.
TED's audience consists primarily of lifelong learners, professionals, and anyone interested in expanding their knowledge and understanding of the world.
lore: TED was founded in 1984 as a conference focusing on Technology, Entertainment, and Design.
It has since expanded to cover a wide range of topics and has become a global platform for sharing ideas worth spreading.
TED Talks have been viewed billions of times online, making them one of the most influential sources of information and inspiration in the world.
TED has expanded its reach with various initiatives, including TEDx events, TED Fellows, and TED-Ed.
TED's content has influenced countless individuals and organizations, contributing to innovation, education, and positive change around the world.
